2021 Hurricane Season Off to Very Early Start!

Tropical Storm #Andres has formed in the North Pacific. Andres (40 mph winds, moving NW at 6 mph) is the earliest NE Pacific named storm on record, breaking old record of May 10 set by Adrian in 2017.

#ClimateChange
